name: assignSlaToDownloadedSnapshots
description: Assigns an SLA Domain to a list of downloaded snapshots. The SLA Domain manages retention for the snapshots in the downloaded location. The assignment does not affect the retention of the snapshots in other locations.

body.description: An object ID and a list of IDs for the downloaded snapshots. The specified SLA Domain manages retention for the downloaded copy of snapshots assigned to the specified IDs.

$ul: **responses**: The asynchronous request status of a batch request.
